name: Coffee Attribute Extractor
content: Extract attributes from the given coffee product description. Return the result as a JSON object with the following structure: {"Origin": "...", "RoastLevel": "...", "FlavorProfile": "...", "Organic": "...", "FairTrade": "...", "ProcessingMethod": "..."}. Use "Unknown" if an attribute is not mentioned.

name: Coffee Categorizer
content: Categorize the given coffee product into appropriate subcategories. Return the result as a JSON object with the following structure: {"Subcategory": "..."}. Choose from: "Whole Bean Coffee", "Ground Coffee", or "Coffee Pods".
